summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account for the period from April 1, 2015, to April 30, 2015. It details various debits and credits, including preauthorized debits for taxes and fees, and provides contact information for inquiries regarding the account.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $256,774.79 on April 1, 2015.
The ending balance as of April 30, 2015, was $148,367.95.
Numerous preauthorized debits were made for tax services and fees throughout the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
There are multiple references to ADP for tax and payroll services.
